meanings.definition: The trunk of the human body.
meanings.sent1: She held her injured torso and winced in pain.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined his patient's torso for any signs of injury.
meanings.sent3: The toddler found it amusing to poke his own torso and giggle.
meanings.sent4: His torso was a pillar of strength, supporting him through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The torso houses vital organs that keep us alive.

meanings.definition: The main part of a statue or other sculpture.
meanings.sent1: The torso of the marble statue was beautifully sculpted.
meanings.sent2: The artist focused on perfecting the details of the statue's torso.
meanings.sent3: The torso of the sculpture seemed to be the center of attention at the art exhibit.
meanings.sent4: The torso of the statue stood out, showcasing the artist's skill.
meanings.sent5: The torso of the sculpture captured the essence of grace and strength.
